languages.text:
Grants +{uip|Momentum|c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}. Then, the Ministorum Priest gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} stacks of {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}zeal{/g}.
Does not provoke {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attacks of opportunity{/g}.
! Can only be used once per combat.

! Utilisable une fois par combat.

获得{uip|Momentum|c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}点{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}，随后国教牧师获得{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}层{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}狂热{/g}效果。
此能力不会引发{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}。
！此能力每场战斗只能使用一次。

Este movimiento no provoca {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataques de oportunidad{/g}.
! Solo puede usarse una vez por combate.

languages.text:
{uip|Momentum|85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を与える。
その後、司祭は+{uip|Value_2|85e6ce25a6d64313b9ff39a8013d1b43}スタックの{g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}熱心{/g}を得る。
{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}隙攻撃{/g}を誘発しない。
！1戦闘につき1回だけ使用できる。

languages.text:

Способность не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаки по возможности{/g}.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

Способность не провоцирует {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}.
! Может использоваться только 1 раз за бой.

+{uip|Momentum|c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff} {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazandırır. Ardından Ministorum Rahibi, +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|f:eeecc5cab7b846e8b1478ecfa15ce9bc}hamiyet{/g} birikimi kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Fırsat saldırılarını{/g} tetiklemez.
! Her çatışmada sadece bir kez kullanılabilir.

languages.text:
We grant a momentum equal to {uip|Momentum|c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}.
The priest himself after take momentum, receives Fervour Point equal {uip|Value_2|c647c1c4a1a14c9cb31217ee439164ff}.
Does not provoke AoO.
!Can only be used once per combat.
